alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:27PM CDT until August 09 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TANEY...SOUTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN AND EAST CENTRAL STONE COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Merriam Woods, or near Forsyth, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Rockaway Beach, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Taneyville, Kirbyville, Spokane, Chestnutridge, Powersite, Garrison, Ozark Beach and Walnut Shade. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
